6.81: Increased  Flaming Lasso manacost from 150 to 225.
6.82: Sticky Napalm is now dispelable. Increased  Flaming Lasso cooldown from 90/70/50 to 90/75/60.
6.69: Sticky Napalm Fixed overhead stack numbers being visible to enemies. Fixed proccing  Linken's Sphere.
6.84: Sticky Napalm no longer ignores ancient creeps, Roshan and creep-heroes.  Flamebreak No longer deals 75/150/225/300 instantly upon impact. Now places a debuff on enemies which deals 50 damage per second for 1/2/3/4 seconds. No longer damages Roshan.  Firefly Reduced damage from 20/40/60/80 to 10/30/50/70. No longer damages Roshan.
6.63: Reduced base attack damage from 40-46 to 24-28 (total attack damage is now 48-52).  Sticky Napalm Fixed slowing for always the full amount, instead of stacking up per cast. Fixed more bugs with Sticky Napalm. Increased manacost from 15 to 20.
6.81b: Sticky Napalm damage is now halved against non-hero units.
6.77: Flaming Lasso now disarms Batrider for its duration.
6.76: Reduced  strength gain from 2.7 to 2.4. Reduced  Flamebreak vision from 800 to 300 and made its vision to no longer linger for 3.34 seconds.
6.72: Reduced base armor from 1 to 0 (total armor is now 2.1).
6.75: Increased  strength gain from 2 to 2.7. Improved turn rate from 0.4 to 1.0. Reduced  Sticky Napalm,  Flamebreak and  Flaming Lasso cast time from 0.3 to 0.2.  Firefly The fire trail now lasts its full duration, instead of disappearing prematurely when Batrider dies. Increased duration from 15 to 18.
6.66: Reduced  Flaming Lasso cooldown from 130/90/50 to 90/70/50.
6.61: Reduced  strength gain from 2.5 to 2.  Sticky Napalm no longer triggers on  Radiance damage.
6.79: Reduced base attack damage 24-28 to 14-18 (total attack damage is now 38-42). Reduced day vision from 1400 to 1200.  Flamebreak no longer ignores its cast backswing. Reduced  Flaming Lasso cast range from 175 to 100.
6.78: Reduced day vision from 1800 to 1400. Increased  Flamebreak manacost from 80/100/120/140 to 140 on each level.
